entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
